extendedInfo.description: Manage your CitibankÂ® and CitiÂ® credit card accounts with Citi Mobile(SM). Just install the app and sign on with your online User ID and Password.The app has been updated to enhance performance and support additional Citi productsBANK CUSTOMERSâ¢ Check your Citi account balances â¢ See recent activityâincluding details about your credit card transactions â¢ Pay bills and track payments â¢ Transfer funds between your accountsâ¢ Pay other people with Popmoneyâ¢ Deposit checks to your Citibank personal checking accountCREDIT CARD CUSTOMERS â¢ Make your credit card payment for ANY AMOUNTânot just the minimum dueâ¢ Check your outstanding balance â¢ See recent transactions â¢ View your available credit â¢ Track rewards FIND CITI LOCATIONS â¢ Quickly find the nearest ATMs/branches SECURITY â¢ Account information is protected by 128-bit encryption, as it is when you bank online. Deposit accounts are offered by Citibank N.A. Member FDIC. Citi credit cards are issued by Citibank, N.A. (1)(1)	Please note, Citibank does not charge you a fee for using the Mobile Check Deposit service. However, charges from your wireless carrier may apply. Regular account charges apply. The Mobile Check Deposit service is subject to eligibility. Deposit limits and other restrictions apply.

reviews.title: Solid App
reviews.comment: Works well... Does take a few seconds to open up (literally 3-4 seconds, really not a big deal) and let\'s me manage my account without going through the mobile website (which i do find to be more cumbersome to navigate). Recommended. Samsung GS3 running CM10
reviews.author: Steven Kim

reviews.title: Neil
reviews.comment: Extremely disappointed that after a year I still cannot install this on either my first generation or second generation Nexus 7..... Really!  Get you app tablet ready Citibank!!
reviews.author: Arthur Lardon

reviews.title: Slow to load and very primitive
reviews.comment: Coming from IOS I was exremely disappointed at this app, which feels like it is simply a shortcut to generic mobile site. This app consistantly takes 8-10 seconds to load on my Galaxy S4, I can\'t imagine how slow it must be on older devices.
reviews.author: John Lemp

reviews.title: No tablet support!
reviews.comment: Seriously?? Time to switch banks. Local credit unions do better apps!
reviews.author: Pawe\305\202 Czopowik

reviews.title: Very slow. Very sad app.
reviews.comment: This app is very slow it takes 10 to 15 seconds to start each time on any phone and lacking a lot of features Citibank really needs to redo this app for Android.
reviews.author: Shawn Fonseca

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on T598
reviews.comment: I have the Samsung Exhibit (T599) but the app never works.  It justs says \"loading\" constantly after I attempt to log on.
reviews.author: Stephen Feger

reviews.title: Slow..very basic
reviews.comment: When are we getting virtual cc # options? Its faster to open my browser and check my account than with this account
reviews.author: E nitric

reviews.title: Smh
reviews.comment: How come the north american version is this app malfunctions and looks absolutely horrible. The versions in other countries look beautiful but we have to deal with a ugly app that fails constantly
reviews.author: Jeremy Sullivan

reviews.title: convenient
reviews.comment: Very useful. I wouldn\'t need access to a computer and I wouldn\'t have to walk to a citibank Atm to check my accounts.
reviews.author: H Martinez

reviews.title: What happened?
reviews.comment: I had HTC before & the check deposit feature was awesome --- no probkem. However,  when I uograded to Galaxy S4 this feature gave me very unclear pics of the checks I deposit & no longer accepts them. Bummer!!! :-(
reviews.author: Janessa Tiburcio

reviews.title: Other bank apps are better
reviews.comment: They should take a look at BoFA, chase, amex apps. They have better apps. This app is totally rubbish compared to competition. This app makes me feel closing the account with them
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Error code 106
reviews.comment: Upon start up I get above error and it FC... Please fix it, Galaxy S4

reviews.title: EVO 3D
reviews.comment: Good interface, lots of options.  NEED TABLET SUPPORT!  Make it happen and you get 5 stars again.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Could be better
reviews.comment: If we would have the ability to look up atm\'s and branches, this would add to the app. !!!
reviews.author: Alex Ponceano

reviews.title: Is this a legit citi bank app
reviews.comment: I am very afraid that my credit card has been compromised.
reviews.author: Kittu Chaitanya

reviews.title: Horrendous
reviews.comment: Horrendous! Let me guess. You offshored it and the contracting company is no longer around?
reviews.author: Chuan Tsay

reviews.title: Slow and clumsy
reviews.comment: Loads slower than average and does not filter based on all account transactions.  Should have option to download all transactions to show on screen if the filtering is only done on device.
reviews.author: Ryan Johnston

reviews.title: Awful. Loads up very slowly
reviews.comment: Needs an overhaul. Loads up very slowly. Not optimized for android 4. Does not work on htc one. Slow and clunky. Generally does what it says but not many options. Looks like a port of an iPhone app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No longer works
reviews.comment: Was working fine till switching over to galaxy s4. Not sure if it\'s the phone or android 4.2.2 but it doesn\'t work anymore. Only error code 106 shows up.
reviews.author: Kar Wing Louie

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: This app is crap. I mean, it works, but it\'s slow and just horrible. Most banks have better apps.  Your website is great, make the app more like it. Even the logo looks like crap
reviews.author: Miggs G
